ygData.subject: New member
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey everyone! I just started playing EQ again, and I thought I would seek out a club on Yahoo! for the hell of it. I play on two servers
ygData.messageBody:
Hey everyone!<br><br>I just started playing EQ
again, and I thought I would seek out a club on Yahoo!
for the hell of it. I play on two servers
currently:<br><br>Lanys Ty'vyl<br>"Hyuri"<br>Lvl 7 Troll
Shadowknight<br><br>Rallos Zek<br>"Kraimar"<br>Lvl 5 Halfling
Cleric<br><br>I started my halfling three days ago, and I am
putting most of my time into him. I just hit lvl 5
today.. lots of new spells ;) Anyway, I am looking for
groups to adventure with on either server Saturday and
Sunday nights, around 8PM-12PM EST. If interested, check
my profile for email address. My Cleric on Rallos is
pretty good for his level... I am hitting for 20 points
at a time, which is pretty damn good for a shrimp at
5th lvl :) I also have decent equipment, and all my
lvl one spells, and most of my lvl
five.<br><br>Finally, I want to know everyone's thoughts on PK. I like
playing on Rallos because it adds an edge of danger to
the game. Yet when I get tired of watching my back
all the time I head to Lanys. Ironically enough, my
Troll on Lanys has died seven or eight times... while
my Halfling has yet to die even once, and on a pk
server to boot. Do you all like the current pk rules?
When I first started, players could be looted for
money and ANY item. Now it's limited to carried items,
worn items, and money. I'm not complaining too much,
but it seems to neuter pk'ing.<br><br>Hope to see
some of you on EQ soon,<br>Sandwalker
